self.xoffset = -15 local newWidth = min(128, self.text:GetStringWidth()+50) local texCoordoffsetX = (newWidth/128)*.25
self:GetNormalTexture():SetTexCoord(.703125-texCoordoffsetX, .703125, .0078125, .2421875) self:GetPushedTexture():SetTexCoord(.703125-texCoordoffsetX, .703125, .2578125, .4921875) self:GetHighlightTexture():SetTexCoord(.703125-texCoordoffsetX, .713125, .5078125, .7421875)

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if self:IsEnabled() then self:SetTextures("Interface/Buttons/UI-Silver-Button-Down") local point, _,_, x, y = self.icon:GetPoint(1) self.icon:SetPoint(point, x - 1, y - 1) end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if self:IsEnabled() then self:SetTextures("Interface/Buttons/UI-Silver-Button-Up") local point, _,_, x, y = self.icon:GetPoint(1) self.icon:SetPoint(point, x + 1, y + 1) end

Scripts.OnEnter: self.highlight:Show() GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") if self.spellID then GameTooltip:SetHyperlink("spell:"..self.spellID) end self.showingTooltip = true

self.highlight:Show() GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") local parent = self:GetParent() if parent.spellID then GameTooltip:SetHyperlink("spell:"..parent.spellID) end parent.showingTooltip = true

Scripts.OnLoad: ScrollFrame_OnLoad(self) self.ScrollBar.bg = self.ScrollBar:CreateTexture(nil, "BACKGROUND") self.ScrollBar.bg:SetAllPoints() self.ScrollBar.bg:SetTexture("interface/buttons/white8x8") self.ScrollBar.bg:SetVertexColor(0, 0, 0, .2) self.child = CreateFrame("FRAME") self.child:SetSize(1, 1) self:SetScrollChild(self.child)

Scripts.OnEnter: self.highlight:Show() if self.tooltip then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_TOP", 0, -15) GameTooltip:SetText(self.tooltip, nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine(self.tooltipDescription, 1, 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnLoad:
self.background:SetBackdrop({ bgFile = "Interface/Tooltips/UI-Tooltip-Background", edgeFile = "Interface/Tooltips/UI-Tooltip-Border", tile = true, tileEdge = true, tileSize = 16, edgeSize = 16, insets = { left = 4, right = 4, top = 4, bottom = 4 }, }) self.background:SetBackdropColor(TOOLTIP_DEFAULT_BACKGROUND_COLOR:GetRGB()) self.background:SetBackdropBorderColor(FRIENDS_GRAY_COLOR:GetRGB())
local anchorsToFrame = { CreateAnchor("TOPLEFT", self.background, "TOPLEFT", 8, -8), CreateAnchor("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.background, "BOTTOMRIGHT", -8, 8), } local anchorsToBar = { CreateAnchor("TOPLEFT", self.background, "TOPLEFT", 8, -8), CreateAnchor("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.scrollBar, "BOTTOMLEFT", -3, 4), } local scrollBox = self.editFrame:GetScrollBox() ScrollUtil.RegisterScrollBoxWithScrollBar(scrollBox, self.scrollBar) ScrollUtil.AddManagedScrollBarVisibilityBehavior(scrollBox, self.scrollBar, anchorsToBar, anchorsToFrame)
local editBox = self.editFrame:GetEditBox() editBox:SetMaxLetters(255) editBox:HookScript("OnTextChanged", function(editBox, userInput) self.limitText:SetFormattedText(MACROFRAME_CHAR_LIMIT, editBox:GetNumLetters()) if userInput then self.saveBtn:Enable() self.cancelBtn:Enable() end end)

Scripts.OnMouseDown: self.Art:SetPoint("CENTER", -1, -2) if button == "LeftButton" then local parent = self:GetParent() parent:GetParent():dropDownToggleClick(parent) end
if self:IsEnabled() then self.arrowUp:Hide() self.arrowDown:Show() end

Scripts.OnLoad: self.setPointArrow = function(self, checked) if self.vertical then if checked then self.icon:SetPoint("CENTER", 0, 1) self.icon:SetTexCoord(1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 1) else self.icon:SetPoint("CENTER", 0, -1) self.icon:SetTexCoord(0, 1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0) end else if checked then self.icon:SetTexCoord(1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0) self.icon:SetPoint("CENTER", -1, 0) else self.icon:SetTexCoord(0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 1, 1) self.icon:SetPoint("CENTER") end end end hooksecurefunc(self, "SetChecked", self.setPointArrow)
Scripts.OnMouseDown: if self:IsEnabled() then self:SetTextures("Interface/Buttons/UI-Silver-Button-Down") local point, _,_, x, y = self.icon:GetPoint(1) self.icon:SetPoint(point, x - 1, y - 1) end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if self:IsEnabled() then self:SetTextures("Interface/Buttons/UI-Silver-Button-Up") local point, _,_, x, y = self.icon:GetPoint(1) self.icon:SetPoint(point, x + 1, y + 1) end

Scripts.OnEnter: local parent = self:GetParent() if parent then parent:GetScript("OnEnter")(parent) end
Scripts.OnLeave: local parent = self:GetParent() if parent then parent:GetScript("OnLeave")(parent) end
Scripts.OnDragStart: local parent = self:GetParent() if parent then parent:GetScript("OnDragStart")(parent) end
Scripts.OnShow: if self.parent then self:SetParent(self.parent) self:SetAllPoints() end

Scripts.OnUpdate: local x, y = GetCursorPosition() local scale = UIParent:GetScale() self:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", x / scale - 16, y / scale - 16)

Scripts.OnLoad: self:SetTextInsets(0, 16, 0, 0) self.Instructions:SetText(NAME) self.Instructions:ClearAllPoints() self.Instructions:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self, "TOPLEFT", 5, 0) self.Instructions:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self, "BOTTOMRIGHT", -5, 0)
Scripts.OnTextChanged: local textExists = self:GetText() ~= "" self:GetParent().save:SetEnabled(textExists) self.clearButton:SetShown(self:HasFocus() or textExists) InputBoxInstructions_OnTextChanged(self)

Scripts.OnClick: local frame = self:GetParent() while not frame.selectButtonClick do frame = frame:GetParent() end if button == "LeftButton" then frame:selectButtonClick(self.id) elseif button == "RightButton" then frame:showCompanionOptionsMenu(self) end
Scripts.OnEnter: if self.creatureID then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.name:GetText(), 1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:Show() MJTooltipModel.model:SetCreature(self.creatureID) MJTooltipModel:Show() self.showingTooltip = true end

Scripts.OnTextChanged: if userInput then local int, dec = self:GetText():gsub(",", "."):match("(%-?%d*)(%.?%d*)") if int == "" and dec ~= "" then int = "0" end self:SetText(int..dec) end
Scripts.OnEnterPressed: local parent = self:GetParent() local slider = parent.slider local value = tonumber(self:GetText()) or 0 if not parent.noLimit then local min, max = slider:GetMinMaxValues() if min > value then value = min elseif value > max then value = max end end slider:GetScript("OnValueChanged")(slider, value, true) self:ClearFocus()
Scripts.OnMouseWheel: local parent = self:GetParent() local slider = parent.slider local value = (tonumber(self:GetText()) or 0) + parent.step * delta if not parent.noLimit then local min, max = slider:GetMinMaxValues() if min > value then value = min elseif value > max then value = max end end slider:GetScript("OnValueChanged")(slider, value, true)

Scripts.OnLoad: hooksecurefunc(self, "SetValue", function(self, value) local edit = self:GetParent().edit edit.curValue = value edit:SetNumber(value) edit:SetCursorPosition(0) end)
Scripts.OnValueChanged: if not userInput then return end local parent = self:GetParent() local step = 1 / parent.step value = math.floor(value * step + .5) / step self:SetValue(value) parent:onValueChanged(value)

Scripts.OnLoad: self.setOnChanged = function(self, func) self.onValueChanged = func end self.step = 1 self.setStep = function(self, step) self.step = step end self.setMinMax = function(self, min, max) self.slider:SetMinMaxValues(min, max) end self.setValue = function(self, value) self.slider:SetValue(value) end self.setText = function(self, text) self.slider.text:SetText(text) end self.setMaxLetters = function(self, value) self.edit:SetWidth(value * 7 + 7) self.edit:SetMaxLetters(value) end self.disable = function(self) self.edit:Disable() self.slider:Disable() end self.enable = function(self) self.edit:Enable() self.slider:Enable() end
